name: Sara International Travel
description: Provider of Hajj and Umrah services.
overview: Sara International Travel offers travelers the ability to find the right Hajj package for their pilgrimage with complete confidence, by making it their top priority to answer any questions or concerns travelers may have. Sara International Travel takes its role in providing a rewarding spiritual experience seriously. In doing so, they work according to the Quran and Sunnah. With over 19 years of experience in the Hajj and Umrah, this company offers unmatched guidance and leadership so that travelers can focus on what’s important. A dedicated staff of more than 30 team members provides training to prepare travelers. In-person seminars, online lectures and web resources are available to help prepare pilgrims before their journey.
